profile.title: User Profile
profile.preferredLanguage: I lo ngaihtuah zawng zawng tawh chhan

profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Thumal leh an zirna chu an ni te in en

profile.allowExplicitContent: Tum tak takte chu phal rawh

profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Auto delete ni turin second te

profile.noPrivateKey: He device ah private key awm lo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Backup tur password a siam rawh:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup a hman theih nan encrypt a ni ta.
profile.enterBackupPassword: He backup tur password dah rawh:
profile.importSuccess: Private key chu he device ah a luh ta.
profile.importFailed: Key import a hlawhtlin lo (password dik lo emaw file tihsual emaw a ni).
profile.keysRotated: Key thar a siam leh ta, public key upload a ni ta.
profile.keyDisclaimer: I private key chu he device atangin a chhuak dawn lo. Password neih angin backup siam rawh chuan a hman leh theih ang.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Free plan atang hian Sun leh Moon theme tur hi hman theih a ni. Theme dang te chu i upgrade a ngai.
profile.backupDesc: I key te chu password hmangin encrypt rawh, device dangah restore leh sync turin.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Message te chu a tha takin blur rawh
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: App chu unfocus ni zawngin blur rawh
profile.holdToReveal: Hneh chhuak nan i la lo
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka message copy a ni chuan min hrilh rawh
profile.followHint: An story chu i Following feed ah a lang ang, Followers (ema Public) audience in an post chuan.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: He thil ah chuan eng emaw i tihsual a awm.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Incoming call leh text te chu i verify phone emaw email-ah forward rawh. Outgoing call/text te chu i Chatforia number an hmu theih ang.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Text te chu phone ah forward rawh
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Text te chu email ah forward rawh

chat.selectPrompt: Text emaw chat room emaw thlang la chhiar rawh
